department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch:
"本課程的教學目標在使學生：
一、掌握數位學習發展趨勢
二、培養數位學習領域專業素養與跨領域整合能力
三、瞭解數位學習相關產業發展現況
四、加強未來數位創新能力與數位實踐能力"
goal.en: "This course is designed as a platform for graduate students to get insights into the research and the practice in the field of e-learning. In each week, a researcher or expert in the field of e-learning will be invited to give a talk. After the talk, students will have the opportunities to discuss with the researcher or expert."

gradMethod.ch:
"一、課堂出席與提問 (20%)
課堂出席及參與提問，若無法出席，請與老師及助教請假。

二、個人心得報告 (30%)
撰寫個人心得報告，每人至少繳交五次。心得報告內容不需詳述演講內容，請多著墨個人心得與跟自己研究的關係。報告需於每週四演講結束後至該週日上傳至系統。

三、主題論文報告 (25%)
小組將針對指定主題進行相關文獻收集與探討，並且進行整合與討論。

四、小組期末報告 (30%)
小組成員需於2019/12/31前繳交企業參訪報告書，並於最後兩週在課堂中進行口頭報告，每組報告(含討論)時間約50分鐘。"
gradMethod.en:
"1. Attendance (20%)
Attendance and asking questions in the class.

2. Individual report (30%)
Individual report on each talk. At least 5 reports should be submitted. Please focus on your reflections on each talk and discuss the relationship of the talk and your research. Please submit your report by the end of the Sunday of each week.

3. Specific Topic Literature Report (25%)
The students need to conduct relevant literature collection and discussion on the specific topic in group, and present their report on class with the other classmates.

4. Group Project report (25%)
The students must submit the company visit report as the group report, and give oral reports in the classroom during the last two weeks. The time for each group (including discussion) is about 50 minutes."

培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力

培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to promote and put network learning in use
Develop the ability to create a user-friendly network learning environment
Develop multi-disciplined talents with international perspective
